text:
Hey guys,
Just a question, if I have 5 different projects, can each project have it's own sandbox account?
I think so. I think you need a new configuration file in each project folder that will tell it which sandbox to use
I have my main HubSpot folder with all my sub projects under that folder but my config file is in the main HubSpot folder. thus they use the same configuration to go to a single sandbox
but if you do an HS init in each subfolder you should be able to configure each project independently... Im no expert yet but I think this is the solution
